basic.name: Blade Dash (Q)
basic.description: Dash forward and deal 63 damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.

basic.name: Twin Blades (W)
basic.description: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

basic.name: Phase Prism (E)
basic.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 damage to the first Hero hit and swaps Artanis's position with theirs. Hitting a Hero also grants Artanis Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds. Can be used during Blade Dash.

heroic.name: Suppression Pulse (R)
heroic.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

heroic.name: Purifier Beam (R)
heroic.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

trait.name: Shield Overload (T)
trait.description: After taking damage while below 75% Health, Artanis gains a 365 Shield for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

1.name: Reactive Parry
1.description: Damaging enemy Heroes with Twin Blades or Blade Dash grants Artanis 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%.Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Amateur Opponent
1.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

1.name: Protector Of Aiur
1.description: Quest: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Artanis's Attack damage by 0.1%.  Takedowns grant 1% bonus damage.

4.name: Psionic Synergy
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 30 Armor for 5 seconds.

4.name: Shield Battery
4.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 125% faster while its Shield is active. Passive: Reduce Shield Overload's cooldown by 4 seconds.

4.name: Shield Surge
4.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 80% while below 25% Health.

7.name: Solarite Reaper
7.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 175%.

7.name: Chrono Surge
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 40% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds and Slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

7.name: Final Cut
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage. While under 25% Health, this damage bonus is increased to 60%.

10.name: Suppression Pulse
10.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.name: Purifier Beam
10.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

13.name: Templar's Zeal
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 6 seconds.

13.name: Triple Strike
13.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Graviton Vortex
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 50 to 25. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 2 seconds.

13.name: Phase Bulwark
13.description: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.

16.name: Force of Will
16.description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

16.name: Blades of a Templar
16.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Zealot Charge
20.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 75%.

20.name: Plasma Burn
20.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 damage per second to nearby enemies.
